branchCategory.name: IDU, High Inlet Temperature Dryers
branchCategory.description: <p>Series IDU provides a stable supply of dry air even under high demand conditions with an inlet air temperature up to 176°F. The IDU's stainless steel heat exchanger improves corrosion resistance. Each unit is also equipped with an evaporation thermometer as a standard feature.</p>

branchItem.name: IDU*E, Refrigerated Air Dryer, Size 3~75, High Inlet Air Temperature
